summary: A custom set of male-only light armour.
descriptionHtml:
~~McMutton\'s Slayer Armour~~

Included herein is a new, custom set of male light armour with the same stats as iron. It can be found just west of Riverwood, past the river by a fallen tree.

It includes all of the usual pieces, including a shield gauntlet. The headpiece will fit every race, including Argonians and Khajiit.

It can be tempered using the same ingredients as iron armour.

~~Notes~~
The weight slider should be functional now. If not, lemme know so I can yell at Skyrim and try to fix it.

~~Permissions~~
If you\'d like to use this armour for something, go right ahead. Just let me know what you\'re doing and give me the proper credit.

~~Credits~~
Thanks to Saio and Richgar for testing it out.

And thanks to Dragten for figuring out the weight slider issue.

~~Features~~
Many thanks to those that have featured this mod in their mod videos:
[youtube]9AohLm7FS-Y[/youtube]
[youtube]cKO1SleYWPg[/youtube]
author: McMutton
